name: Use software write blockers to provide read only access to storage media
description: Use of a software-based tool that prevents a computer from writing to computer storage media connected to it (NIST 2006)
references: NIST (2006) NIST SP 800-86 Guide to Integrating Forensic Techniques into Incident Response, https://doi.org/10.6028/NIST.SP.800-86
